elements.name: panel1
elements.title: Answer the questions about the text.

elements.name: question1
elements.title: Which levels of communication are suitable for a conflict-free conversation?
elements.correctAnswer: The factual level and the self-disclosure level contribute to mutual understanding and are therefore less prone to conflict than the relationship level and the appeal level.

elements.name: question4
elements.title: Why is communication on a factual level usually pleasant?
elements.correctAnswer: Because the emotions are left out of the game and there is no room for speculation about "hidden" messages.

elements.name: question2
elements.title: Why do self-confident people communicate better?
elements.correctAnswer: Confident people are less likely to feel attacked by others, do not have to constantly justify themselves and are more likely to receive messages on a factual or self-disclosure level. They have the courage to say exactly what they mean and are less vague or ambiguous.
